data.text: @JGerrings @Keir_Starmer The only vague difficulty here, is that one of them wields absolute power and is currently using it to invade a neighbouring country, while the other is the leader of the opposition in the UK. Do you understand enough about UK politics to realise that means he has no power?
@JGerrings @dollymix2015 @Keir_Starmer My mother used to say "Never trust a man whose eyes are close together" 😶
@JGerrings @Keir_Starmer Freedom of speech is not the Marxists way. Starmer is always has been a Marxist.
